trans-unit.source: Provides access to the application domain and process of an add-in.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso para o domínio de aplicação e o processo de um suplemento.

trans-unit.source: Use this class to load add-ins into a desired environment, which can be one of the following: - An existing application domain for which you have the <xref:System.AppDomain> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar esta classe para carregar os suplementos para um ambiente pretendido, o que pode ser um dos seguintes:-um domínio de aplicação existente para a qual tenha o <xref:System.AppDomain>objeto.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: - An application domain that was automatically generated to activate an add-in.
trans-unit.target: -Um domínio de aplicação que foi gerado automaticamente para ativar um suplemento.

trans-unit.source: - An existing external process.
trans-unit.target: -Um processo externo existente.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the AddInEnvironment object for an add-in, pass the add-in's application domain to the AddInEnvironment class constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o objeto de AddInEnvironment para um suplemento, passe domínio de aplicação do suplemento para o construtor de classe AddInEnvironment.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A> property of the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController> class to obtain the add-in's AddInEnvironment object.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar o <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController>classe para obter objeto de AddInEnvironment do suplemento.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you obtain the AddInEnvironment object, you can do the following: - Pass that AddInEnvironment object to the appropriate <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> method overload.
trans-unit.target: Após obter o objeto de AddInEnvironment, pode fazer o seguinte:-passar esse objeto AddInEnvironment para apropriados <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>sobrecarga de método.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The add-in will be activated in the application domain and process that is represented by the AddInEnvironment object.
trans-unit.target: O suplemento será ativado no domínio de aplicação e do processo que é representado pelo objeto AddInEnvironment.

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment.Process%2A> property to obtain an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> object.
trans-unit.target: -Utilize o <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment.Process%2A>propriedade para obter um <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>objeto.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment.Process%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then pass that object to the appropriate <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> method overload.
trans-unit.target: Então, passe desse objeto para as adequadas <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>sobrecarga de método.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The add-in will be activated in the process that is represented by the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> object but in a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: O suplemento será ativado no processo de que é representado pelo <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>objeto, mas num novo domínio de aplicação.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If you have access to the application domain that contains the add-in you need, you can use this constructor to obtain the add-in's <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver acesso para o domínio de aplicação que contém o suplemento tem, pode utilizar este construtor para obter o add-in <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>objeto.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you can use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A> property of the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController> class to obtain the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, pode utilizar o <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController>classe para obter o <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>objeto.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application domain that contains the add-in.
trans-unit.target: O domínio de aplicação que contém o suplemento.

trans-unit.source: appDomain is .
trans-unit.target: appDomainis .

trans-unit.source: Full-trust permission is demanded.
trans-unit.target: Permissão de fidedignidade total é demanded.

trans-unit.source: A caller in the call chain does not have sufficient permission.
trans-unit.target: Um chamador na cadeia de chamada não tem permissão suficiente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref> object that represents the process in which the add-in is running.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"> </xref> objeto que representa o processo no qual o suplemento está a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to activate multiple add-ins in the same process but in different domains.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para ativar vários suplementos no mesmo processo, mas em domínios diferentes.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> object obtained with this property to the appropriate <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> method overload.
trans-unit.target: Transmita o <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>objeto obtida com esta propriedade para apropriados <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>sobrecarga de método.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>

trans-unit.source: If you want to activate them in the same domain in an external process you should pass the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object directly to the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender ativá-los no mesmo domínio num processo externo, deverá passar a <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>objeto diretamente para o <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment%29?displayProperty=fullName>sobrecarga de método.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: The process in which the add-in is running.
trans-unit.target: O processo no qual o suplemento está a ser executado.
